name: Niveda Foundation (Trust)
briefDescription: Mission-EDUCATE AND EMPOWER THE UNSERVED WITH THEIR WORTH, FOR A BETTER TOMORROW.Niveda Foundation is a registered Charitable Trust, started in May 2014. Niveda started its journey with the Non Formal Schooling centre in Harola, a rural village in Noida, Niveda is mainly into Education and Skilling of Women and Youth.Niveda is also into Health initiatives.
